mapper.select: SELECT C.MEMBER_NO, C.PRODUCT_NO, C.CART_NO, C.CART_QTY, C.PRODUCT_SIZE, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_PRICE, MAX(PI.PROIMG_NO) AS PROIMG_NO, PQ.PRO_DISCOUNT FROM CART C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRO_NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE PI ON C.PRODUCT_NO = PI.PRO_NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT_QTY PQ ON C.PRODUCT_NO = PQ.PRO_NO WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} GROUP BY C.CART_NO
SELECT DISTINCT PI.* FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE PI INNER JOIN CART C ON PI.PRO_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO WHERE C.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (MEMBER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, CART_QTY, PRODUCT_SIZE) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{productNo}, #{cartQty}, #{productSize})
